title: Save
subtitle: the date
what-text1: Graag nodigen wij u uit voor onze geloftevernieuwing op 13/04/2024 (onze vijfde huwelijksverjaardag). Er is een ceremonie gepland, gevolgd door een diner en een afterparty om het te vieren.
what-text2: We would love to see you shine in a stylish and colourful outfit that makes you feel beautiful and ready to party.
accomodation-text: A lot of you are coming from far, to make your search for a location easier we've made a list with some suggestions:
gifts-text: This celebration wouldn’t be the same without your presence. Our top priority of this party is for all of us to have a good time and make memories together. When it comes to presents, we would appreciate a kind donation and perhaps some ideas for our honeymoon that is still awaiting to be experienced. If you want to give us a physical gift, we would greatly appreciated something preloved.
